insert into farms.farm_configuration_parameters ( configuration_parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value, sensitive_data_ind, config_param_type_code, revision_count, who_created, when_created, who_updated, when_updated ) values ( #{configurationParameterId}, #{dto.parameterName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.parameterValue, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.sensitiveDataInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, ( select cptc.config_param_type_code from farms.farm_config_param_type_codes cptc where cptc.config_param_type_code = #{dto.configParamTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} ), 1, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update farms.farm_configuration_parameters set parameter_name = #{dto.parameterName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, parameter_value = #{dto.parameterValue, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, sensitive_data_ind = #{dto.sensitiveDataInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, config_param_type_code = ( select cptc.config_param_type_code from farms.farm_config_param_type_codes cptc where cptc.config_param_type_code = #{dto.configParamTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} ), revision_count = revision_count + 1, who_updated = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, when_updated = now() where configuration_parameter_id = #{dto.configurationParameterId, javaType=java.lang.Long, jdbcType=BIGINT, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: delete from farms.farm_configuration_parameters where configuration_parameter_id = #{configurationParameterId, javaType=java.lang.Long, jdbcType=BIGINT, mode=IN}
